input.sentences: husband | wife and family | taking a nice portrait .
the man and woman seem to have different traditions .
holding what looks like fluff in their hands | i wonder what that signifies .
the bride is having a sweet conversation with this little girl .
the bride dancing | happy shining in her moment .
output.sentences: There are many different traditions in marriage through out the world.
This woman & man are getting married.
This tradition places the woman's and man's hand together.
In other traditions, the bride uses a flower girl.
Often the bride and the groom have the first dance at the wedding reception.
